God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019You should speak to your seniors, career counsellors, upgrade your skills, and apply for internships.It's up to you to sell yourself and your value to the company you want to work for. Your degree doesn't matter much after you get a seat in front of your future boss for an interview. 1 comment4

Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 30 Nov 2018Take up job internships to find out more about certain career and the related industry. Give yourself time to explore different careers. Do not rush into it. Speak to career counsellor if there is a need to. 0 comments1
